trans-unit.source: Provides pixel format conversion functionality for a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供了用于像素格式转换功能<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: FormatConvertedBitmap implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: FormatConvertedBitmap 实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>接口来优化多个属性上的初始化。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>

trans-unit.source: Property changes can occur only during object initialization.
trans-unit.target: 只能在对象初始化过程中进行属性更改。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> to signal that initialization has begun and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> to signal that initialization has completed.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>发出信号初始化已开始和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>以指示已完成初始化。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 初始化后，将忽略属性更改。

trans-unit.source: FormatConvertedBitmap objects created using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette%2CSystem.Double%29> constructor are automatically initialized, and property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 使用创建的 FormatConvertedBitmap 对象<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette%2CSystem.Double%29>构造函数将自动初始化，并且将忽略属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette%2CSystem.Double%29>

trans-unit.source: For format conversions between RGB color spaces with different characteristics, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> class should be used.
trans-unit.target: 格式之间的转换具有不同特征的 RGB 颜色空间<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>应使用类。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: Conversions between color spaces need a source color profile and destination color profile for gamut mapping to provide a reliable color conversion.
trans-unit.target: 颜色空间之间的转换需要源颜色配置文件和目标域映射提供可靠的颜色转换颜色配置文件。

trans-unit.source: The color profiles are provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext> parameters of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%2A> or by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.DestinationColorContext%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.SourceColorContext%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 颜色配置文件由<xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext>参数<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.DestinationColorContext%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.SourceColorContext%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.SourceColorContext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.DestinationColorContext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext>

trans-unit.source: Metadata tags related to image data must be updated if an image is saved to a file after a transform is applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用转换之后，将图像保存到文件，则必须更新与映像数据相关的元数据标记。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>接口来优化多个属性上的初始化。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize></xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: To initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> created using this constructor, you must perform property initialization between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: 若要初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>使用此构造函数创建的你必须执行之间的属性初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>调用。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref> class that has the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.Source*>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat*>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.AlphaThreshold*>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref>具有指定的类<> *1>， <> </> *1>， <> </> *1>，和<> *1>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> objects created using this constructor are automatically initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>使用此构造函数创建的对象将自动初始化。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 初始化后，将忽略属性更改。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.Source*> of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.Source*>新<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref>实例。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.Source*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat*> of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat*>新<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref>实例。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette*> of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref> instance if `destinationFormat` is an indexed format.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette*>新<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref>实例如果`destinationFormat`是索引的格式。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.AlphaThreshold*> of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.AlphaThreshold*>新<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref>实例。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.AlphaThreshold*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alpha channel threshold of a bitmap when converting to palletized formats that recognizes an alpha color.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个位图的 alpha 通道阈值时将转换为可识别 alpha 颜色的托盘化格式。

trans-unit.source: The AlphaThreshold value is used to determine what level of opacity will be mapped to the fully transparent color in the converted format.
trans-unit.target: AlphaThreshold 值用于确定的不透明度级别将映射到转换后的格式完全透明的颜色。

trans-unit.source: A value of 9.8 implies that any pixel with an alpha value of less than 25 will be mapped to the transparent color.
trans-unit.target: 9.8 值意指小于 25 的 alpha 值与任何像素，将映射到透明的颜色。

trans-unit.source: A value of 100 maps all pixels which are not fully opaque to the transparent color.
trans-unit.target: 100 的值将映射不是完全不透明的透明颜色的所有像素。

trans-unit.source: The destination palette should provide a transparent color; otherwise, the transparent color will be the one closest to zero, often black.
trans-unit.target: 目标调色板应提供透明的颜色;否则，透明颜色将接近零，通常黑色的一个。

trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The alpha channel threshold for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此的 alpha 通道阈值<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0.0。

trans-unit.target: 已调用 BeginInit。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.

trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the pixel format to convert the bitmap to.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要转换到位图的像素格式。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The pixel format to apply to the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于位图的像素格式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormats.Pbgra32*>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormats.Pbgra32*>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormats.Pbgra32*>

trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the palette to apply to the bitmap if the format is indexed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当索引格式时要应用于位图的调色板。

trans-unit.source: You must set this property if you want to use an indexed pixel format for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要用于<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat%2A>索引的像素格式，则必须设置此属性

trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.Source*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>. -or- The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationFormat*> property is an indexed format and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.DestinationPalette*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>. -or- The palette colors do not match the destination format. -or- The EndInit method is called without first calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap.BeginInit*>.
trans-unit.target: The <>*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>. -或- <> </> *1> 属性是索引的格式和<> *1> 属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。 -或者-调色板颜色与目标格式不匹配。 -或-EndInit 方法调用之前未先调用<> *1>。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the source for the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置位图的源。

trans-unit.source: You can chain a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> to another <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> by setting the Source property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> that you want.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将链接<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>到另一个<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>通过设置的源属性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>到<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>想。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.FormatConvertedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Chain BitmapSource Objects Together](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for an example of chaining.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[How to︰ 链 BitmapSource 对象在一起](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)有关链接的示例。
